# VEHICLE::IS_PED_EXCLUSIVE_DRIVER_OF_VEHICLE

## Summary
See if this ped is the exclusive driver of the vehicle and also return which driver index the ped has been set as

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT\*** driver

## Returns
* **BOOL**
